Contents: 0:00 Introduction 2:47 Humanity and unity in the Anthropocene: we don't talk about colonialism 9:08 Fewer refugees and less coal, kinda 13:09 Batteries get cheaper, so what? 14:55 The Great Horse Manure Crisis 19:40 The little country that could: Norway isn't representative 22:47 When numbers blind us: irrationality of rationality and instrumental reason 30:54 It's just the economy, stupid: green growth is fake 35:38 Decoupling, numbers, and monkey brains 43:04 We'll help the poors this time, we pinky promise: Global South 44:58 The pacifier of carbon capture 48:35 We hear you, so shut up: not really addressing criticism 50:05 New optimism and making the numbers talk 58:00 How do you do, fellow climate activists? Co-opting the climate movement 1:00:40 When civilizations go bad: cheap natures and the capitalocene 1:06:04 We'll help the poors this time, too: agricultural boogaloo 1:08:44 Ecomodernism: Those Magnificent Men and Their Green Machines 1:15:27 The part with the propaganda: we only have capitalism and degrowth sucks 1:23:54 Agreed: personal responsibility is horse emissions 1:25:46 Solarpunk: the future that is actually fresh 1:31:07 The Kurzgesagt, uh, solution 1:35:27 The man behind the curtain 1:36:48 Jobs the comet will provide: billionaire non-imagination 1:41:51 The T3 solutionğŸ‡µğŸ‡±
